title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When the font size of a label is modified, the label's height does not change right away.
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Modify the font size of a label.
OB: The label's height remains the same, even after changing the font size.
EB: The label's height should adjust accordingly to accommodate the modified font size.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Locate a label.
3. Modify the font size of the label.
4. Observe that the label's height does not change to match the font size.
